Title.Blurb: Sale of your Principal Residence Summary

Note.Blurb: The following list summarizes the sale of your principal residence(s). If you wish to review or edit an item on the list, click on the applicable item.

Button.target_calc:
tds.taxp_pr_instance.set(0) tds.SP_DISPOSE.set(0) tds.SP_DISPOSE_NO.set(0) tds.PR_DISPOSE_TP.set(0) tds.PR_DISPOSE_SP.set(0) tds.PR_DISPOSE_BOTH.set(0) tds.TAXP_ADD_PROP.set(0) tds.SP_ADD_PROP.set(0)
if is_dual(): return 'step|s_pr_sp_dispose(prevStep="%s")' % ('s_pr_summary') else: tds.TAXP_ADD_PROP.set(1) return "step|s_taxp_pr_add_property_redirect"
